title: CraftBukkit1.7.2仍在开发中. .
author: Sonic1997
txt_content:
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads ... craft-1-7-2-update.
文章很长，懒得翻译
总之结果是CraftBukkit1.7.2还没出来
不过正式版1.7.2会是什么名字呢.w.


THIS IS NOT AN UPDATE FOR MINECRAFT RELEASED IN OCT 2013
